					StaticText '4'
			[695] listitem ''
				[696] link 'Pipelines 1', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/byteblaze/a11y-webring.club/-/merge_requests/40/pipelines'
					StaticText '1'
			[698] listitem ''
				[699] link 'Changes 7', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/byteblaze/a11y-webring.club/-/merge_requests/40/diffs'
					StaticText '7'
		[713] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'This PR adds two different implementations of a way to verify members of the webring.'
		[714] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'The first,'
			[715] code ''
				StaticText 'verify.mjs'
			StaticText 'simply makes sure that the listed URL only returns a response in the'
			[716] code ''
				StaticText '2xx'
			StaticText "range. This is a quick spot check to make sure that the site owner doesn't redirect to a different location. The second,"
			[717] code ''
				StaticText 'verifyDNS.mjs'
			StaticText "is slightly more complicated. It verifies, using DNS TXT records, whether a site owner controls their own domain by requiring a TXT record on the listed hostname. Both of these functions use Netlify's scheduled functions feature."
			[718] code ''
				StaticText 'verify'
			StaticText 'runs daily and'
			[719] code ''
				StaticText 'verifyDNS'
			StaticText 'runs weekly. Obviously that timing can be changed by updating the value in'
			[720] code ''
				StaticText 'netlify.toml'
			StaticText '.'
		[721] paragraph ''
			StaticText "Neither of these implementations solves the question as to what to do if one of these functions actually encounters that scenario. I don't know much about Netlify or whether it has logging or alerting functionality. Hopefully this helps in the discussion in"
			[722] link '#33 (closed)', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/ericwbailey/a11y-webring.club/-/issues/33'
			StaticText '.'
		StaticText 'Edited'
